New Records: Mendes scored the winning goal in the 88th minute, securing Cape Verde's qualification to the AFCON quarter-final with a late goal
Key Match Events: Cape Verde maintained 70% possession and capitalized on a corner kick in the 70th minute
Mendes' clinical finish in the 88th minute transformed the match
Mauritania's most dangerous moment was a free-kick in the 57th minute that lacked precision
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde came close to breaking the tie on several occasions
The match was marked by a lack of clear-cut goal-scoring opportunities until Mendes' late goal
